original_title: Sri Lanka settles Rs191bn in arrears: Minister
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has settled 191 billion rupees out of 360 billion rupees in arrears which were pending from August 31, 2022, State Minister for Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya has said.
By January 2023, 169 billion rupees in arrears remained to be settled.
Out of that 100 billion rupees related to current spending and 69 billion was capital.
Out of the current spending arrears to be settled, 18.9 billion rupees related to health, 19.3 billion related to gratuity and pensions and 12 billion related to fertilizer and chemicals.
They will be settled based on priority, Minister Siyambalapitiya had said. (Colombo/Feb25/2023)
